Metadata.description: Vitor Pereira - Full Stack Developer specializing in React, React Native, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, NestJS, and Laravel. Personal website and portfolio.

Hero.name: Vitor Pereira
Hero.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
Hero.description: Passionate about creating amazing digital experiences with modern technologies
Hero.profileImageAltText: Picture using Ghibli Studio style of me

description.firstParagraph: I am a Full Stack Developer with over 4 years of experience working on projects of different sizes and industries. I have achieved important deliveries at the companies where I worked, contributing to every stage of software development — from requirements analysis to production deployment.
description.secondParagraph: My journey includes working with legacy systems as well as building new solutions such as marketplaces, mobile apps and robust web platforms. I have hands-on experience with React, VueJS, Next.js, NestJS, Laravel, Flutter, Oracle Forms, PL/SQL, and in creating and consuming REST APIs, along with modern version control and CI/CD practices using Git, GitHub Actions, Bitbucket and GitLab.
description.thirdParagraph: Currently I focus on building scalable and efficient solutions, paying close attention to both user experience and system architecture.
